title: Authors and Citation

text: Yanez Santibanez C (2022). aussiemaps: Maps Australia. R package version 0.2.0.0008.
code: @Manual{,   title = {aussiemaps: Maps of Australia},   author = {Carlos {Yanez Santibanez}},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.2.0.0008}, }

title: aussiemaps
text: aussiemaps provides Australian LGA, suburbs Postal Area maps directly R, without need download process shapefiles. data package created using scripts provided . sf objects contain (Suburb,LGA, Postal Area) intersection polygons, allow select, filter re-construct geographic units.

title: aussiemaps
text: First install required packages,, install package github Alternatively, install r-universe package contain data files, downloaded first time call library. Alternatively, can download directly:
code: install.packages("tidyverse","sf","lwgeom","devtools") devtools::install_github("carlosyanez/aussiemaps") install.packages("tidyverse","sf","lwgeom","devtools")  # Enable this universe options(repos = c(     carlosyanez = 'https://carlosyanez.r-universe.dev',     CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Install some packages install.packages('aussiemaps') devtools::install_github("carlosyanez/aussiemaps.data")

title: aussiemaps
text: development package still progress.also intends provide granular suburb/postal area maps, may suitable use cases. great Australian maps packages, : ozmaps, good nation-wide, states LGA maps, well electoral divisions. package CRAN. absmaps, provides maps ABS statistical divisions.

title: aussiemaps
text: find something quite right, please post issue. ideas, want contribute, please let know!

title: aussiemaps
text: moment, package provides maps internal states territories.

title: aussiemaps
text: LGA localities maps sourced data.gov.au used CC0-licence. Postal areas constructed using definitions shape files Australian Bureau Statistics (ABS)

title: Convert data, aggregating smallar geographic structures into larger ones. — geo_aggregate
code: geo_aggregate(   original_data,   values_col,   original_geo,   new_geo,   grouping_col,   year,   proportions_manual = NULL )

title: Convert data, aggregating smallar geographic structures into larger ones. — geo_aggregate
text: original_data data frame data values_col name column numeric data original_geo name column representing smallest geo unit (using names geo structure) new_geo name column representing largest geo unit (using names geo structure) grouping_col vector columns preserved transformation year year geo structures belong proportions_manual manual list correspondences, override -package proportions based area.

title: Convert data, aggregating smallar geographic structures into larger ones. — geo_aggregate

code: get_map(   filter_table = NULL,   filters = NULL,   year,   aggregation = NULL,   simplification_factor = 1,   smoothing_threshold = 4 )

title: Get sf object containing selected map polygons — get_map
text: filter_table table filter (can start location_table) filters list filters year year aggregation name column aggregate (POA_CODE16, LOCALITY,LGA) simplification_factor 0-1 simplication threshold pass rmapshaper::ms_simplify() smoothing_threshold smoothing threshold (default 1, km^2)
